title: I Can't Tell You Why
lyrics:
Look at us Baby
Up all Night
Tearin' our love apart
Won't be the same to people
who live through years in the Dark
Every time I try to walk away

something makes me turn around and stay

And I can't tell You why



When we get get crazy

It just ain't right

(try to keep your head little girl)

Girl, I get lonely, too

You don't have to worry

just hold on tight

(don't get caught in your little world)

Cause I love You (oh..oh..oh)

Nothin's wrong as far as I can see

We make it harder than it has to be

And I can't tell you why

No, Baby

I cant tell you why

I can't tell you why



Every Time I try to walk away

Something makes me turn around and stay

And I can't tell you why

No, no Baby

I can't tell you why

I can't tell you why

I cant tell you why....
